{{Infobox dungeon |name = Cerulean Cave |image = [[File:Cerulean Cave.png|400px]] |caption = An overhead map of Cerulean Cave. |tokens = 2,500 |location = North of Cerulean City }} '''Cerulean Cave''' is a dungeon in [[Kanto]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 28,735 |- | Boss || 143,675 |- | Moltres || 215,512 |}
===Pokémon===
* Arbok * Raichu * Sandslash * Golbat * Parasect * Venomoth * Kadabra * Magneton * Dodrio * Hypno * Ditto * Wigglytuff * Electrode * Marowak * Cahnsey * Rhydon (boss) * Mewtwo (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 25% |- | [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | [[Lucky Incense]] || 25% |}
